programme.title: UFOs | Mysteries of Football
programme.desc: Is there any relation between UFOs and football? There have been many games in that past where strange sightings have taken place, but the real question is why?

programme.desc: Can a football team truly be cursed? In the third episode of the series, Diego Ripoll explores some of the curses suffered by important teams around the world.

programme.desc: Do ghosts like football and is that's why they appeared in several matches? Mysteries investigates this incredible phenomenon.

programme.desc: Nieve Pegg and Jack Downer countdown through their ten favourite goals and ten most memorable moments from the FIFA Women’s World Cups. A tribute to the brilliance, drama, and history of the women’s game.

programme.desc: Nieve Pegg and Jack Downer countdown through their top ten England players, greatest goals, and most iconic kits at FIFA World Cups. A celebration of legendary figures, stunning strikes, and classic shirt designs.

programme.desc: Nieve Pegg and Jack Downer countdown through their ten best and ten most heart-breaking moments for the England national team at FIFA World Cups. A rollercoaster of emotion from unforgettable highs to devastating lows.

programme.desc: This enrapturing film looks at inimitable talents Garrincha and Pele propelling Brazil to their first FIFA World Cup trophy, and exclusive footage of how players entertained themselves off the pitch in Sweden.
